session_info.name: MOYAB1 - Plenary Invited Oral Presentation (Circular and Linear Colliders)

papers.title: The First Years of LHC Operation for Luminosity Production
authors: A summary of the first 3 years of LHC operation is presented with a discussion on the performance ramp-up
operation efficiencies and system reliability. The main contributory factors to peak and integrated luminosity performance are outlined.
